headline: EPAM Systems (EPAM) Is Down 16.5% After Cautious 2026 Outlook and AI Expansion Update
summary: In February 2026, EPAM Systems reported Q4 and full-year 2025 results showing higher sales and earnings per share than a year earlier, completed a US$223.5 million buyback of 1,160,000 shares announced in October 2025, and issued 2026 guidance calling for mid-single-digit revenue growth and GAAP operating margins of 10% to 11%. Alongside these results, EPAM highlighted fast-growing AI-native revenue, launched its Empathy Lab AI agency in North America after an initial rollout in Europe, and...
